SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into five_ed_task_user (task_id, step_build_id, step_build_name, major_name, major_charge_men, major_charge_men_name, major_charge_men_mobile, approve_men, approve_men_name, proofread_men, proofread_men_name, design_men, design_men_name, audit_men, audit_men_name, criterion_examine_men, criterion_examine_men_name, all_men, all_men_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, seq ) values (#{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepBuildId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stepBuildName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorChargeMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorChargeMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorChargeMenMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proofreadMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proofreadMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{designMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{criterionExamineMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{criterionExamineMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update five_ed_task_user set task_id = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, step_build_id = #{stepBuildId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, step_build_name = #{stepBuildName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_name = #{majorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_charge_men = #{majorChargeMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_charge_men_name = #{majorChargeMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, major_charge_men_mobile = #{majorChargeMenMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_men = #{approveMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_men_name = #{approveMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proofread_men = #{proofreadMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proofread_men_name = #{proofreadMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, design_men = #{designMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, design_men_name = #{designMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_men = #{auditMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_men_name = #{auditMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, criterion_examine_men = #{criterionExamineMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, criterion_examine_men_name = #{criterionExamineMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, all_men = #{allMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, all_men_name = #{allMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, task_id, step_build_id, step_build_name, major_name, major_charge_men, major_charge_men_name, major_charge_men_mobile, approve_men, approve_men_name, proofread_men, proofread_men_name, design_men, design_men_name, audit_men, audit_men_name, criterion_examine_men, criterion_examine_men_name, all_men, all_men_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, seq from five_ed_task_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, task_id, step_build_id, step_build_name, major_name, major_charge_men, major_charge_men_name, major_charge_men_mobile, approve_men, approve_men_name, proofread_men, proofread_men_name, design_men, design_men_name, audit_men, audit_men_name, criterion_examine_men, criterion_examine_men_name, all_men, all_men_name, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified, seq from five_ed_task_user
